title: Senator Chris Murphy, "The Violence Inside Us"
description:
Senator Chris Murphy (D-CT) looks at the origins of violence and firearms in America’s history and the role they play in society today. He’s interviewed by Thomas Abt, author and Council on Criminal Justice senior fellow.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
